title: Spoopy Music - Loops and Spooks Pack
longDescription:
Darkness falls across the land, and VaiaMan is close at hand...

This brand new 2022 spoopy music pack contains our 14 best high-quality tracks for your spooky/halloween game! Spoopy Music has everything you need, including beastly beats, eerie ambience, and chilling chiptune. VaiaMan has lovingly crafted this music to make your game stand out amongst the rest!


If you want a taste of our tunes, check our Sampler Track on YouTube!


Tracklist:

Bonegrubber - 02:11

Ghosts on the Dancefloor - 01:36

Slimy Slums - 01:49

The Dusty Crypt - 02:29

Diablos Muertos - 01:46

The Other Side - 01:25

Really Bad Luck - 00:51

Empty Orphanage - 02:00

Broken Spirits - 01:38

Styx and Bones- 02:28

Nightwatch - 01:04

Frosty Graveyard - 01:58

The Puppets are Watching - 02:04

Whisper Woods - 01:36

Total length: 24 minutes 55 seconds.


All of these tracks are perfect loops. File types: wav

This music can be used for any project; personal or commercial.

Please leave a comment, we LOVE to hear from you!

COMMISSIONS OPEN!

Contact VaiaManMusic@gmail.com if you want a custom soundtrack :)

Until next time... 💀 🕷️ happy haunting!👻 🦇

Artwork by https://twitter.com/PhoeTheGreat
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  14 Looping Spoopy Tracks
  •  .wav and UE Audio Cues prepared


Number of Audio Wavs: 14

Number of Audio Cues: 14

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 24

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Documentation: Load the package and enjoy Spoopy Music!

For 5.0/5.1/5.2 Users - please select "Open a copy" when it asks about conversion to be safe :)
